reviewText: This DVD is priced $14.00 MORE than on Clean Run!!!

Best instructional DVDs that I've ever seen - turns training a dog to jump into a science that is easy for human and dog to understand.
Get the workbook, also - it diagrams all the jump layouts that you will use.  Great stuff - and I've been training dogs since 1972.
We are enjoying working through these discs. Lots of good exercises with good demonstrations & back ground information.
I was very impressed with the teaching process to teach dogs to jump properly. Very easy format to follow! Highly recommend it for any age dog.
